name: James Arthur
text: I really loved their food. I always get awesome service there. The place is well kept and the staff members are always helpful. Will visit here again.

name: Nicky Rodriguez
text: The gentleman in store was helpful, friendly and showed genuine concern when a friend and I had an issue with online ordering. The pizza we got came out cooked to perfection! Thank you guys for making our night! The picture came out blurry but the pie was delicious!

name: Ron Markovitch
text:
The order was 10/10 in every aspect.

The young man on the phone was very friendly, accurate and easy to order from. …More

name: Ashley
text: My card was charged PRIOR to being told they can not deliver to our address. The manager on duty (a woman I believed name Molly) did not apologize or attempt to make it right in any capacity. She was very rude that I even addressed it as an …More

name: Susan Homik
text: Best PIZZA! Every time cooked perfectly and delivered quick.  My favorite go to place for Pizza.

name: Rhonda McLain
text: I've been to this location a few times & Jada has always been very sweet & polite! She deserves acknowledgement for being an AWESOME employee!! Keep shining sweetie!!

name: Lori Mackey
text: Best pizza ive had from hungry howies in a long time. It was hot and it got to me fast. Excellent service!

name: Scott Alexander
text: Service was pretty good but I think the food quality has gone below standards. Obviously corporate or franchise decided to start skimping on quality ingredients. The pizza was like something you would get at an inner city school lunch room …More

name: Christian Domzal
text: Just got an order. Been a customer for this location for 10 yrs. Quality has gone way down hill. 63$ with tip. Wings are burnt & tasteless & pizza wasn't any better. Not happy. …More

name: Henry MAGASARK
text: Food employees kind of rushed messed up order a couple times

name: Will Moreno
text: I go with my wife to this lovely place quite often! This is my favorite place to dine.  I go to this spot routinely. The cooking is just great, the staff members are welcoming and the cost is good. I like eating in this spot to have a decent dinner.

name: MiKoROGOD
text: Called to order a pizza. Was on hold for 10 minutes listening to there recording waiting for someone to answer. Never answered. Ordered from papas instead. They wanted the business.

name: Lionnell Jemes
text: Finest spot to eat food when in a hurry. Their service is speedy, rates are affordable, excellent ambience. Would recommend to others

name: Willene Hagermann
text: Had a good experience in this spot with my daughter. The food comes out fast and the customer service is just awesome. Prices are affordable.

name: Oz Mitchell
text: Been ordering from this place for yrs ..This lady is ALWAYS RUDE ...Food under cooked its sad ......Never Again

name: Johnathon Tilicki
text: I ordered from this place for the first time since I got home from deployment today. Man, I am a happy man! My delivery showed up 20 minutes early, my delivery driver was cool, and the pizza was on point. Thank you, Hungry Howies for putting an awesome franchise location in Saint Clair Shores! It does your brand name well!

name: Joshua Peace
text: This is for the St.Clair shores/ Roseville location at 31400 Harper Ave. I placed a delivery order online, when I received the order everything was under cooked an was raw. I called an told them it was war an they were putting in a new …More

name: carrie M
text: Always fast delivery. Something was messed up with our order and they fixed it really quick. Great customer service and yummy stuffed bread

name: Robert Downer
text: We eat here at least 6 times a month ! My family and I enjoy hungry howies!

name: Tom Lee
text: Odered a pizza to be delivered, they called me 35 minutes later and said they could not deliver and so i cancled my order, ordered from store 53 29042 Utica Rd, Roseville, MI 48066, they delivered it no issues.

text: My fave. Pizza is always top quality and exactly as i order.

name: D B Transport LLC
text: I like the subs pizza pretty good as well

name: bryan lynch
text: Got a pizza with bacon and a chicken bacon ranch sandwich. Both were good, although they did forget the butter cheese crust and they forgot the sauce for the sandwich. Which are two pretty big disappointments when you don't notice until your sitting at home 15 minutes later.

name: Khryscynda Simmons
text: Best Pizza in town! And the staff is always friendly and knowledgeable!

name: Kat
text: New owner in last year has a great group working for him. Store is super super clean and they just bought brand new ovens in 2018. Our pizza's is ALWAYS done to perfection!

name: Michael
text: Great pizza, better than most chain places. They make sure your order is right. The blonde that manages the place is nice. Really friendly and professional.

name: James Herod
text: Good value for the $.

name: Ernest Cloud
text: I don't eat things like this anymore... So i was pleased with service & food

name: Richard Crabb
text: 1st time we did a online order and they filled the order incorrectly. Shame a dad takes the blame for Hungry Howie mistakes.

name: Tiffany Slavko
text: Got my crust wrong I'm furious. It tastes horrible.

text: I’ve been going to this hungry homies my whole life and I just love back into town about a week ago and ordered from there twice. It takes th an hour and a half to go a half mile down the road, food is always cold. The delivery driver kept …More

text: We called this pizza place because it was on the way home. We order two large pizzas- one with sausage and one with ham.  When we arrive we were given one pizza with half pineapple and bacon and the other half cheese only.  The other pizza …More

name: S LaForest
text: Recently they got new owners and the food is so much better than it used to be! Also it looks cleaner! Talked with the owner the other day, he seems like a great guy and cares about the customers!

name: Mike Schneider
text: Pizza is very good and service is great. Time frame is great.

name: Stephanie L'Esperance
text: I go to this Howie's once a week on average. 100% rating by me. Friendly staff. Use fresh pizza dough. …More

name: rochelle Martin
text: staff is horrible. they are open until 1 am, yet, they don't answer the phone at 12:30. they avoid late customers. wonder if the owner knows how much business they are losing.

name: Mike Soulliere
text: While waiting for my food, I look to the corner and see a half dead cockroach.... one of the employees then proceeds to tell me it's normal and the Chinese restaurant next door has tons of them and it's very dirty there... eat at your own risk haha

text: Always good pizza

name: alexis king
text: Web time said an hour but our pizza was delivered in half the time. The pizzas were hot and the order was correct.

name: Mrs. Dammann
text: Worst customer relations ever ! Have been long time customers until today. They sent a very burnt pizza home with us and when we called to let them know all they would do is remake the  pizza. When I said do you compensate for a mistake …More

name: Kris Osmond
text: Horrible customer service, waited 90mins for an order that never came. A complete waste of time.  The only thing gained is knowing never to do business with this place again. I will be sure to pass it on.
